name: Black Peacoat
description: A classic coat with modern tailoring to update the look while still protecting you from the elements. Made of 100% Merino wool
attribution: Photo by Ismael Abdal Naby studio
care: For best results, dry clean only.

name: Blue Suit
description: A classic color for a classic man. Expertly crafted and custom tailored to order, this classic color stands out with it's wool blend and silk lining.
care: For best results, dry clean only.

name: Brown Pinstripe
description: The classic look of a pinstripe suit has never looked more modern in this new style. Custom tailoring and a matching vest will make you stand out in any crowd.
care: For best results, dry clean only.

name: Brown Crop Suit
description: This crop jacket reveals a modern look with classic luxury. With roomy shoulders and a shorter length in the jacket, this profile will turn heads while providing you with luxury comfort with our wool construction and silk lining.
care: For best results, dry clean only.

name: Burgundy Suit
description: Traditional meets modern in this rejection of Beau Brummell colors while embracing sleek styling with a comfortable cut. This slim fit is staight enough in the leg for added comfort while keeping a stylish silhouette.
attribution: Photo by The Lazy Artist Gallery
care: For best results, dry clean only.

name: Grey Two-Tone
description: For a true mashup of modern and classic styling, this tweed jacket stands out in the crowd with polyester sleeves and a wool vest. It's a combination that shouldn't work, but somehow it does. Custom tailored.
care: For best results, dry clean only.

name: Hex Button Suit
description: This classic black suit pulls in a second look with these uniquely styled buttons and accessories. Sometimes the best way to stand out in a crowd is by blending in.
care: For best results, dry clean only. Machine washable on cold. Do not tumble dry. Hang or lay flat to dry.

name: White Suit
description: Cool comfort with luxuorious style. This white suit is breathable and spill proof while being stylish and comfortable. Pair it with some dock shoes and your days on the Riviera couldn't be more perfect.
care: For best results, dry clean only.
